sub_title: Prof. Dr. | Emerging Markets Master | Advisor on Eco-Efficient Transformation of Material Energy Tech-Ecosystems (Li, H2, Nb) | Life-Career Mentor for Global Change Makers & Talents
summary:
Synchronizing Global Material Tech Transformation, Consciousness, Scale Up, and Jazz

Since 1996, I've advocated for both mature and emerging markets in my global consulting and executive transformation journey, including the US, Germany, the UK, Japan, South Korea, Brazil, and China. In 2010, my expertise began expanding into India. What fuels my dedication? Guiding companies and leaders to embrace an eco-efficient future and achieve lasting success. My jazz saxophonist days in Alabama in the mid-'80s gave me a unique lens to navigate today's paradoxical and multifaceted transformation patterns—challenges that are poised to intensify in the near future. This musical foundation fuels my unwavering commitment to sustainable business. 

My Dual Commitments:

1. Sustainable business transformation and global market scale-up: I started with advanced cybernetic simulations in the late '80s and co-implemented an early Circular Computer Platform with key players like IBM, Siemens, UBS, SWICO, and the Swiss Science Foundation. More recently, I've focused on transforming Material Tech Value Chains such as Niobium, Nanocrystals, and Lithium across global markets, ensuring technological progress and sustainable growth.

2. Conscious Transformative Leadership: Through my extensive involvement in over 150 global CEO search assignments, I've helped shape the next generation of transformative leaders. In 2011, I introduced "The CEO's LEGACY", a program that evolved in collaboration with world-renowned institutions. It's been rewarding to see it resonate with more than 50 CEOs, from powerhouses like Bayer to innovators like PayPal.

On the educational front, beyond my Master of Philosophy and MBA, my 1992 Ph.D. research at the University of St. Gallen introduced "Meta-Ecology", a framework for scaling sustainable HW SW Tech ecosystems. In 1997, I earned an associate professorship in Global Business Transformation at the venerable Universidad Nacional Mayor de San Marcos. My toolkit for transformation is diverse, spanning expertise in System Dynamics, PyTorch, to deeper human-focused certifications in NLP and Clinical Hypnotherapy.

Currently, I'm deeply involved in the UN's visionary 'Just Green SDG Cities Initiative'. While recognizing there's no one-size-fits-all for green transition, my extensive experience in transformation provides actionable insights. My vision is to empower female leaders and upcoming Gen Z and Alpha generations, collaboratively crafting ecosystems in cities, markets, and Material-Tech-AI settings that are green, fair, and competitive.

profile_positions.location: Amsterdam - New York - São Paulo - Ahmedabad
profile_positions.description:
Lab X Holding is a dynamic global investment and advisory firm headquartered in Amsterdam. Our mission is to create cross-continental Stakeholder Ecosystems and end-to-end Low Carbon Value Chain Platforms that fuel economic growth, foster social progress, and generate positive ecological impact:

_ NANO Material: Cutting-edge High-Tech Platforms 
_ MINING-LITHIUM-MOBILITY closed loop "Circle Economy" Platforms 
_ VTOL Mobility: Next-generation Mobility Platforms 
_ Hybrid Cloud AI Enterprise: Advanced Platforms for AI and Cloud Computing 
_ NGO Learning & Progress: Platforms empowering NGOs for continuous improvement 
_ Global C-Suite, High Tech & CONSCIOUS LEADER-Platforms 

At Lab X Holding, we are dedicated to catalyzing technological innovation and driving sustainable business impact. Join us as we shape the future of socio-human-tech and finance-impact platforms worldwide.
profile_positions.title: Chairman Lab X Holding

profile_positions.description: Gao Feng Advisory Company is a pre-eminent strategy and management consulting firm with roots in China and a global vision, capabilities, resources, and network. We help our clients address and solve their toughest business and management issues -- issues that arise in midst of a fast-changing, complicated, and ambiguous operating environment.
profile_positions.title: Director, Head of Germany & Brazil

profile_positions.description: Formula Air Grand Prix is a game-changer in the fast-evolving sector of air mobility developing 5G-AI-EV-propulsion technologies, creating new sports series as well as advanced connected social mobility technologies; e.g. co-developing the most advanced Human-Tech mobility ecosystems and safety standards in future sustainability-driven cities, developing regions, and communities.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder of FORMULA AIR GRAND PRIX, Member of FAI

profile_positions.description:
Supporting the Latin American/ US NGO start-up Aprende y Prospera, focusing on Governance, Innovation, and mostly on Talents for a compelling sustainable future. 

A comprehensive and personalized EMPOWERMENT PROGRAM FOR YOUNG LATIN AMERICAN & AMERICAN TALENTS that will allow them to consolidate their business projects and achieve their personal goals. Young people design their life plans with the help of tutors (motivational psychologists) and receive emotional and technical support, and the necessary mentoring to carry out their projects. This is a FREE OF CHARGE EDUCATIONAL & CAREER MENTORING PROGRAM for young people thanks to the solidarity of many people with a spirit of vocation who volunteer their service as tutors, mentors, and facilitators to contribute to the personal growth of our entrepreneurs and to strengthen their business ideas.
profile_positions.title: Chairman of the Advisory Board at "Aprende y Prospera - Learn & Thrive!"

company.name: Universidad Nacional Mayor de San Marcos

profile_positions.company: Universidad Nacional Mayor de San Marcos
profile_positions.description:
For over two decades, I have had the privilege of serving as a distinguished Visiting Professor in Global Business Transformation at the Faculty of Economics. Appointed by the University Council (Senat) in 1997, I am honored to be part of the Universidad Nacional Mayor de San Marcos, the oldest university in the Americas continent, founded on May 12, 1551. Throughout my academic career, I have focused on technology, competency, and social benchmarking studies across Brazil, Latin America, Europe, and Asia. I have been recognized for my research in technology and competency benchmarking studies across Brazil, Peru, and Switzerland through the collaborative project "Sobrevivencia sustenible de las empresas en el proceso de cambio global" conducted in partnership with the Getulio Vargas Foundation (FGV) in Brazil.

I am dedicated to advancing knowledge in these areas and contributing to the academic discourse on global business transformation. It is with enthusiasm that I continue to inspire and empower the minds of future business leaders and change-makers at Universidad Nacional Mayor de San Marcos.
profile_positions.title: Professor for Global Business Transformation in High-Tech-Material Industries and Platforms

profile_positions.description:
"How can we utilize technology to empower social action and impact ecosystems, effectively leveraging aid for the billions of people who depend on humanitarian programs worldwide?"

Simpact Technology has developed innovative heuristics that enable us to qualify and quantify the most genuine impact for beneficiaries: Through real-time collaboration and development, we work closely with beneficiaries to provide long-lasting and transformative assistance that improves their basic human conditions. Currently, our Simpact Technology is undergoing testing and application in various projects within the Lab X Holding portfolio. These include measuring the living impact of Real Estate organizations/platforms, assessing the health and well-being impact of Nano Technologies, and evaluating the social impact of mobility and inclusive technology solutions such as VTOL social-technology platforms. Together, we are dedicated to making a tangible difference and ensuring a meaningful impact for those in need.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder of Simpact Technology

profile_positions.description: As an Executive Committee member overseeing IT, Business Transformation & Impact Strategy, I have spearheaded the co-design and development of hybrid Cloud, App, Consumer AI, and Infrastructure "Frontend, Backend, Middleware, Full-stack, Server Side and Client Side Programming AI". This new department foundation laid the groundwork for a successful IPO, supporting future activities to synchronize the realms of AI, innovation, and E-ESG impact.
profile_positions.title: CIO, Chief Transformation- and Impact Officer at JFL Realty

profile_positions.description:
WHAT IS YOUR CONTRIBUTION to the future? Will you leave your mark on the company or on history? 

Coined and co-developed “The CEO LEGACY” SOCIAL INNOVATION platform together with H. Coutinho; initiated by the alliance of the IMD business school and Dom Cabral Foundation, integrating today more than 50 CEOs from companies like Bayer, Bank of America Merrill Lynch, Cargill, CBMM, Deutsche Bank, DSM, GE, IBM, PayPal, Philips & SAP.
profile_positions.title: Co-Inventor of The CEO Legacy Platform in Brazil/ Switzerland

profile_positions.description:
How can multinational companies strategically develop and implement economic, social, and ecological innovations in the emerging BIC markets (Brazil, Russia, India, China) to achieve measurable impacts? What are the key steps involved in defining, establishing, and operationalizing cross-value chain ecosystems that involve interdisciplinary research and multi-stakeholder industry funding? Furthermore, how can these efforts contribute to addressing climate change by promoting low-carbon economies within the BIC markets?

To address the significant growth opportunities and challenges in the BIC markets, the International INNOVATION Research Project "Global Industry Transformation 2010-2030" was initiated in 2010. This project, supported by a global Chinese, Japanese, South Korean, and Brazilian industry consortium, involved the collaboration of over 40 think tanks, research labs, industry leaders, governmental bodies, and non-profit organizations. Its primary objective was to pioneer an integrated mobility, low-carbon innovation, and economic growth ecosystem and platform in China, India, and Brazil. Since its inception, the project has successfully implemented and managed pilot initiatives.
profile_positions.title: Director GIT-PLATFORM  (BRAZIL, RUSSIA, CHINA, INDIA) GLOBAL INDUSTRY TRANSFORMATION 2010-2030

profile_positions.description: Professor at OneMBA, an Executive MBA program encompassing premier business schools like Kenan-Flagler Business School/ The University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill (UNC); Xiamen University/ China; RSM Rotterdam School of Management at Erasmus University (RSM); EGADE Business School, Tecnológico de Monterrey, Mexico. OneMBA has risen to 6th position in 2021 in the ranking of the best Executive MBAs in the world, MBA Global Ranking, released by CEO Magazine.
profile_positions.title: Associate Professor for Transformative Leadership at  ONE | MBA FGV

volunteer_experiences.description: Co-Developing low/ zero carbon impact and DEI mobility platform solutions (eg. EV/ Hybrid/VTOL), exchanging best-in-breed/ class practices across/ between Amsterdam, Amazonas, Sao Paulo, Rome, New York, Houston, New Delhi & Hong Kong.
Co-Design of the graduation research cooperation Deutsche Telekom & ITA under the lead of Prof. Michal Gartenkraut, eg. Dynamic Pricing Technologies and Impact on the Industry of Electric Power.

Can you imagine millions of people worldwide raising funds for your cause, by simply doing what they have always done, without any additional costs or effort, and by applying an accurate blockchain-based distributed hyper ledgers logic?

Welight is both a social business and a nonprofit with the common purpose of accelerating positive changes globally, offering tech tools to make it radically simple for anyone to generate a significant positive impact.

We use blockchain technology on the base of HYPERLEDGER and in partnership with IBM to ensure and publish, with the highest security standard, the flow of donations and also the impact generated by NGOs.

volunteer_experiences.role: Executive MBA Professor & Ambassador - Global Chinese CEO Program CKGSB 2013
